value.fullName: Unhappy client - Terming and we have tried literally everything
value.label: Unhappy client - Terming and we have tried literally everything

value.fullName: Acquired and no path forward with new parent company
value.label: Acquired and no path forward with new parent company

value.fullName: Renewal CCS Received (5/1/2020 or later) for TDC
value.label: Renewal CCS Received (5/1/2020 or later) for TDC

value.fullName: Redlines in progress and full intent from client to renew direct
value.label: Redlines in progress and full intent from client to renew direct

value.label: Redlines in progress and full intent from client to renew through other partner

value.fullName: Intent to go direct and not renew
value.label: Intent to go direct and not renew

value.label: Intent to contract through other partner and not renew

value.fullName: Intent to renew on TDC paper & evaluate alternative contracting paths to stay with Livongo for 2022 and beyond and CAN contract direct - no paperwork received yet
value.label: Intent to renew on TDC paper & evaluate alternative contracting paths to stay with Livongo for 2022 and beyond and CAN contract direct - no paperwork received yet

value.fullName: Intent to renew on TDC paper & evaluate alternative contracting paths to stay with Livongo for 2022 and beyond and CANNOT contract direct - no paperwork received yet
value.label: Intent to renew on TDC paper & evaluate alternative contracting paths to stay with Livongo for 2022 and beyond and CANNOT contract direct - no paperwork received yet

value.fullName: Intent to renew on TDC paper & no other intent stated and have not received paperwork yet
value.label: Intent to renew on TDC paper & no other intent stated and have not received paperwork yet

value.fullName: No discussions with client or consultant after multiple outreaches
value.label: No discussions with client or consultant after multiple outreaches

value.fullName: Recent launch/renewal, no commitment to renew
value.label: Recent launch/renewal, no commitment to renew

value.fullName: Spoke with client and they are not happy with Livongo
value.label: Spoke with client and they are not happy with Livongo

value.fullName: Conversation had but no clear intent - Met with client / consultant and discussed contracting path options but no commitment yet
value.label: Conversation had but no clear intent - Met with client / consultant and discussed contracting path options but no commitment yet

value.fullName: Conversation had but no clear intent - Met with AE and they verbally said they will not be pushing ngTDC to the client right now
value.label: Conversation had but no clear intent - Met with AE and they verbally said they will not be pushing ngTDC to the client right now

value.fullName: Conversation had but no clear intent - Met with Client/AE/Consultant and discussed changes and were interested in making changes to direct or partner but did not commit yet
value.label: Conversation had but no clear intent - Met with Client/AE/Consultant and discussed changes and were interested in making changes to direct or partner but did not commit yet
